projects.title: MyKhata App
projects.short_description: A simple web app to keep track of your day to day expenses.
projects.description: Made in React, using MongoDB and Azure SQL databases and Express.js for backend. Project is still in development.

projects.title: TicTacToe
projects.short_description: My first project in React. A simple TicTacToe game :)
projects.description: A simple TicTacToe game made using React. It was my first project in React and I learned a lot from it.

projects.title: GenWraps
projects.short_description: A simple method to wrap your python generators for replenishable iterators.
projects.description: This module provides simple classes to wrap your python generator code and produce multiple same state iterators. Used to avoid multiple generator calls.
